name: 蔡福裕
objective: 本門授課之目的在介紹各種有機化合物之合成方法、原理及應用，並探討有機實驗室常用之有機反應及其反應機構。
schedule:
1-3 週 Nucleophilic Addition-Elimination Reaction I
4-6 週 Nucleophilic Addition-Elimination Reaction II
7-8 週 Electrophilic Aromatic Substitution I
9 週 期中考
10-12週 Electrophilic Aromatic Substitution I
13-14週 The Diels-Alder Reaction and Other Pericyclic Reactions
15-17 週 Reactions Involving Free Radicals
18 週 期末考
materials:
Organic Chemistry (Principles and Mechanisms)
Joel Karty
